name: Bagel Avocado Toast with Pears, Tomato & Mediterranean Garlic Lemon olive oil dressing
description: Avocado Bagels with Pears and Tomatoes and Mediterranean Oregano Garlic Olive Oil Dressing Bagel Avocado Toast. Easy Vegan Snack or Breakfast.
recipeIngredient: 1  ripe large Avocado or 2 regular size avocados.
1  large clove of garlic pressed or 1/2 tsp garlic powder
1/4 tsp or more black pepper (i use more)
1/4-1/2 tsp dried oregano or parsley or other dried herbs of choice
1 tbsp really good extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the avocado and mix in salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the avocado and mix in salt and pepper to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: Mix everything until the oil and lemon juice are well combined. Taste and adjust lemon and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing: Mix everything until the oil and lemon juice are well combined. Taste and adjust lemon and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the avocado over toasted bagels or multigrain toasts.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the avocado over toasted bagels or multigrain toasts.

recipeInstructions.text: Add slices of pear or tomato.
recipeInstructions.name: Add slices of pear or tomato.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a generous drizzle of the dressing. Serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Add a generous drizzle of the dressing. Serve!

recipeInstructions.text: For variation: add sprouts or fresh herbs of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: For variation: add sprouts or fresh herbs of choice.
